dashboard.whyAppPassword: Why do I need an app password?
dashboard.whyAppPasswordAnswer: App passwords are more secure than using your main password. They can be revoked independently and have limited permissions, protecting your account from unauthorized access.
dashboard.isMyDataSafeAnswer: Yes! We use industry-standard encryption to protect your credentials. Your data is stored securely and is never shared with third parties. You can revoke access at any time.
